input_text:
Job Title: Senior Program Director

Location: Cleveland, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Project Management

Description:
Are you a Senior Program Director seeking purpose, challenge, and talented colleagues? With a diverse portfolio of retail, light industrial, public works, and auto convenience, CESO has the opportunity for you to develop your career. We develop leaders and empower our associates to use their skills and talents to positively impact the world through service – to our coworkers, clients, and communities. We subscribe to the mission of “finding purpose through serving others,” so if this speaks to you, let’s connect!

Responsibilities

At CESO, a Senior Program Director is responsible for client management of large or multiple programs simultaneously. They will develop and execute strategies to grow client accounts and bring in other services not yet performed by the client. They will coordinate all client activities, monitor & forecast overall program performance, and ensure the delivery of client projects. They will also mentor and develop team members and assist them in their career growth. They will have primary responsibilities that include:

Build, develop, and grow client relationships and satisfactionProvide a high level of customer service to clients, team members and attend internal & external meetingsComplete and confirm financial performance - billing, invoicing, tracking, and client’s accounts receivable by contract terms Lead program teams, facilitate communications and acquire appropriate resources to meet workload levelsCreate and / or review scope and fee proposals prior to issuance to clientsMonitor quality, design technology, and team performance to ensure consistency as well as compliance with contractual agreements on a timely basis Serve as a mentor and supervisor for Project Managers and Production Staff while providing guidance and direction to team members in their professional developmentCommunicate with the team on assigned programs, including client policies, procedures, goals, budgets, and schedulesConduct regular team meetings – motivate team members and create a professional, positive work environment Elicit cooperation from a wide variety of resources, including upper management, clients, and other departmentsPerform other supervisory duties as assigned

Position Requirements Include

Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering with 20+ years of experience managing projects in design and construction-related fields or, in lieu of a degree, 25+ years’ experience in the design and construction-related field and client management Professional Engineering License (PE) preferred Proven track record in leading a team and working with multiple projectsAbility to adapt to shifting priorities, demands, and timelines through problem-solvingKnowledge of Deltek, Mosaic, Bluebeam, and Microsoft Office SuiteAbility to travel 

CESO is a principle-centered organization that aligns with strong service values, integrity, and authenticity. We develop and inspire our Senior Program Directors through training and coaching on the job. At CESO, we believe that work should be more rewarding than just a paycheck. In addition to a comprehensive benefit and compensation program, we create memories and friendships through our employee and service events.

CESO, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. This organization participates in E-Verify and is a drug-free workplace. Criminal background checks and drug/alcohol checks are required.

Experience Level (if available): Director

output_json.title: Senior Program Director
output_json.summary: Seeking a Senior Program Director to develop and lead client relationships, manage projects, and mentor team members.
job_responsibilities: Lead program teams and facilitate communications
Serve as a mentor and supervisor
Communicate with the team on assigned programs
output_json.company_information: CESO is a principle-centered organization with a focus on service values, integrity, and authenticity.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: An Equal Opportunity Employer considering race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
